name: Together Alone
description:
This is a Ludum Dare 38 entry

This planet is an innocent love, it's your everything. Protect it by fending off negative emotions.

WSAD - Move

LMB - Shoot

E - Give health to your planet

F - Toggle fullscreen

Mind giving us a follow? >.>

AceWay (@acewaydev)

Darkeyed (@Darkeyed19)

Jamie (@igdzichu)
